database

Class MySQLAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.MySQLAccess

  • public class MySQLAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class wraps for MySQL establish connection process.
    It allows to set connection information such as
    • login
    • password (note that password is echoed throug md5sum)
    • host
    Author:
    kornicameister
    See Also:
    mysql java driver, MySQLAccess.ConnectionData.setPassword(String)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkForUser()
      Check for user method execute simple sql query that check if user identified by MySQLAccess.ConnectionData.login is a valid application user
      boolean connect()
      Connect method loads the MySQL driver and than tries to establish new connection using databaseName userName userPass and data passed to MySQLAccess.ConnectionData object MySQLAccess.ConnectionData.port
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect safely closses up the existing connection to database identified by databaseName
      MySQLAccess.ConnectionData getConnectionData()
      Method returns reference to connectionData object, that itself allows to set up future connection parameters

    • Constructor Detail

      • MySQLAccess

        public MySQLAccess()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect()
        Connect method loads the MySQL driver and than tries to establish new connection using
        • databaseName
        • userName
        • userPass
        and data passed to MySQLAccess.ConnectionData object
        • MySQLAccess.ConnectionData.port
        Returns:
        boolean
        TRUE if connection had been established and MySQLAccess.ConnectionData.login is valid user
        FALSE - connection was established but database is closed

      • checkForUser

        public boolean checkForUser()
        Check for user method execute simple sql query that check if user identified by MySQLAccess.ConnectionData.login is a valid application user
        Returns:
        boolean
        TRUE user was found
        FALSE otherwise

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect safely closses up the existing connection to database identified by databaseName

      • getConnectionData

        public MySQLAccess.ConnectionData getConnectionData()
        Method returns reference to connectionData object, that itself allows to set up future connection parameters
        Returns:
        the connectionData
        See Also:
        MySQLAccess.ConnectionData
